name: places/ChIJ6eO8q45YwokRrQx0uwpuy6c
formattedAddress: 60 W 75th St, New York, NY 10023, USA
adrFormatAddress: 60 W 75th St, New York, NY 10023, USA

originalText.text: I don’t usually write reviews, but I just had a second issue with an item here. We had couch cushion covers cleaned, and they were returned to us with multiple blue rings/ stains. I had a dress returned to me with light pink rings/ stains all along the front which prompted me to go in. I was hoping they would do the right thing and take a second pass at the dress after I explained the marks were not there when I brought it in and gave the backstory that we also had discoloration with the cushions, but the staff was assuring me that I brought it in with the staining, it could have gotten there when I opened the cover, it’s been too long etc. Very frustrating.

text.text: I don’t usually write reviews, but I just had a second issue with an item here. We had couch cushion covers cleaned, and they were returned to us with multiple blue rings/ stains. I had a dress returned to me with light pink rings/ stains all along the front which prompted me to go in. I was hoping they would do the right thing and take a second pass at the dress after I explained the marks were not there when I brought it in and gave the backstory that we also had discoloration with the cushions, but the staff was assuring me that I brought it in with the staining, it could have gotten there when I opened the cover, it’s been too long etc. Very frustrating.

originalText.text: Excellent laundry service. Fast, reasonable, and they do a great job. I had a bunch of dress shirts tailored here, and turned out really well.

text.text: Excellent laundry service. Fast, reasonable, and they do a great job. I had a bunch of dress shirts tailored here, and turned out really well.

originalText.text: This is my go to dry cleaners. The staff are super friendly, they do great work both in cleaning and tailoring clothes. Highly recommend them. So happy to have them in the neighborhood.

text.text: This is my go to dry cleaners. The staff are super friendly, they do great work both in cleaning and tailoring clothes. Highly recommend them. So happy to have them in the neighborhood.

originalText.text:
I have been doing my laundry and dry cleaning here for two years now, and I could not be happier. They know me immediately when I walk in the door, and they always go out of their way to help me.

I've had a few emergency instances when I needed my laundry and dry cleaning much earlier than anticipated after I had already dropped everything off (I had to move my travel a few days earlier). They were able to rush to finish everything that same day. They even called both me and my fiancee to let us know when everything was finished, so we'd maximize time to pack before our flight. Such kind and amazingly responsive people that work there.

originalText.text: Such great customer service. They welcome you by name and just do a really great job. Wash and fold and dry cleaning is great.
